parameters: Hey, welcome! What do you need today?

When Margaret introduced her boyfriend, I was
surprised, but he seems reliable despite his
appearance, so I feel relieved.

Please stay by Margaret's side until she gets
better...

I thought he was a spineless wimp, but turns out
he's got some guts after all. I've reevaluated him
a little bit.

Take care of Margaret, okay? Well, I guess there
won't be any problems with you.

Are you two really dating? Well, Margaret only
talks about Light, so...

If Light becomes my son-in-law, our shop will be
secure.

I always thought Light was an amazing guy, but to
think he'd have three women... If only I were
younger...

Even though they're called demons, they're no
different from humans. They came to buy sweets the
other day.

Ah...Aeru...I'm sorry, I want you to be by her
side and care for her more than worrying about me.

Ah...Aeru...I'm sorry, I want you to be by her
side and care for her more than worrying about me.
Welcome, we have a great selection of items today.

...Kuro-chan was shorter than me...if you don't
count the horns.

Welcome! If you need anything, please call out to
the person at the counter.

The gaze staring at the counter seems somewhat
mature.

Welcome! If you need anything, just call out to
the person at the counter.

The gaze staring at the counter seems somewhat
mature.
Hey, Aeru! There are various products available!

I'm still not used to it, but I'll try to remember
each one as we go along. Please take care of me
from now on!

It looks like you're busy with work, so I'll
refrain from bothering you further.

I never thought I'd do something like this in my
wildest dreams. Well, it's for her sake, so I
guess there's no helping it.

Hey, you there. Instead of just standing around,
how about buying something?

It looks like you're busy with work, so I'll
refrain from bothering you further.
